parameters.name: reads
parameters.label: Input files
parameters.usage: Specify the location of your input FastQ files.

parameters.name: outdir
parameters.label: Output directory
parameters.usage: Set where to save the results from the pipeline

parameters.name: rrbs
parameters.label: Library type: rrbs
parameters.usage: Set trimming settings for MspI digested samples

parameters.name: pbat
parameters.label: Library type: pbat
parameters.usage: Set trimming settings for post-bisulfite adapter tagging (PBAT).

parameters.name: single_cell
parameters.label: Library type: Single cell
parameters.usage: Set trimming settings for Single Cell libraries

parameters.name: epignome
parameters.label: Library type: TruSeq (EpiGnome)
parameters.usage: Set trimming settings for TruSeq (EpiGnome) libraries

parameters.name: accel
parameters.label: Library type: Accel-NGS (Swift)
parameters.usage: Set trimming settings for Accel-NGS (Swift) libraries

parameters.name: zymo
parameters.label: Library type: Zymo Pico-Methyl
parameters.usage: Set trimming settings for Zymo Pico-Methyl libraries

parameters.name: cegx
parameters.label: Library type: CEGX
parameters.usage: Set trimming settings for CEGX libraries

parameters.name: singleEnd
parameters.label: Single-end sequencing input
parameters.usage: Use single-end sequencing inputs instead of paired-end.

parameters.name: clip_r1
parameters.label: Read Clipping: 5' R1
parameters.usage: Instructs Trim Galore to remove bp from the 5' end of read 1 (or single-end reads).

parameters.name: clip_r2
parameters.label: Read Clipping: 5' R1
parameters.usage: Instructs Trim Galore to remove bp from the 5' end of read 2 (paired-end reads only).

parameters.name: three_prime_clip_r1
parameters.label: Read Clipping: 3' R1
parameters.usage: Instructs Trim Galore to remove bp from the 3' end of read 1 AFTER adapter/quality trimming has been performed.

parameters.name: three_prime_clip_r2
parameters.label: Read Clipping: 3' R2
parameters.usage: Instructs Trim Galore to re move bp from the 3' end of read 2 AFTER adapter/quality trimming has been performed.

parameters.name: aligner
parameters.label: Alignment tool
parameters.usage: Choose whether to align reads with bismark (Bowtie2), bismark_hisat (HISAT2) or bwameth(BWA)

parameters.name: genome
parameters.label: Alignment reference iGenomes key
parameters.usage: Ref. genome key for iGenomes

parameters.name: bismark_index
parameters.label: bismark index
parameters.usage: Path to bismark index (either Bowtie2 or HISAT2, depending on aligner option)

parameters.name: bwa_meth_index
parameters.label: bwameth index
parameters.usage: Path to bwameth index

parameters.name: fasta_index
parameters.label: fasta index
parameters.usage: Path to fasta index

parameters.name: fasta
parameters.label: FASTA
parameters.usage: Path to Fasta reference

parameters.name: known_splices
parameters.label: GTF
parameters.usage: Path to GTF file (bismark_hisat only)

parameters.name: igenomes_base
parameters.label: iGenomes base path
parameters.usage: Base path for iGenomes reference files

parameters.name: container
parameters.label: Software container
parameters.usage: Dockerhub address for pipeline container

parameters.name: plaintext_email
parameters.label: Plain text email
parameters.usage: Set to receive plain-text e-mails instead of HTML formatted.

parameters.name: help
parameters.label: Help
parameters.usage: Specify to show the pipeline help text.

parameters.name: email
parameters.label: Your email address
parameters.usage: Your email address, required to receive completion notification.

parameters.name: max_cpus
parameters.label: Maximum available CPUs
parameters.usage: Use to set a top-limit for the default CPUs requirement for each process.

parameters.name: max_time
parameters.label: Maximum available time
parameters.usage: Use to set a top-limit for the default time requirement for each process.

parameters.name: max_memory
parameters.label: Maximum available memory
parameters.usage: Use to set a top-limit for the default memory requirement for each process.

parameters.name: saveTrimmed
parameters.label: Save Trimmed FastQ files
parameters.usage: Save the trimmed FastQ files the the results directory.

parameters.name: saveAlignedIntermediates
parameters.label: Save Aligned Intermediate BAM files
parameters.usage: Save intermediate BAM files the the results directory.

parameters.name: saveReference
parameters.label: Save reference genome index
parameters.usage: Save the generated reference files the the results directory.

parameters.name: maxMultiqcEmailFileSize
parameters.label: Maximum MultiQC email file size
parameters.usage: Theshold size for MultiQC report to be attached in notification email. If file generated by pipeline exceeds the threshold, it will not be attached.

parameters.name: nodedup
parameters.label: Skip deduplication step after alignment (turned on automatically if --rrbs is set)

parameters.name: project
parameters.label: Cluster project
parameters.usage: For use on HPC systems where a project ID is required for job submission

parameters.name: awsregion
parameters.label: AWS Region
parameters.usage: The AWS region to run your job in.

parameters.name: awsqueue
parameters.label: AWS job queue
parameters.usage: The JobQueue that you intend to use on AWS Batch.

parameters.name: tracedir
parameters.label: Trace directory
parameters.usage: Set to where the pipeline trace should be saved. Set to local path when using AWS on S3.

parameters.name: subsampFilesizeThreshold
parameters.label: Subsample file-size threshold
parameters.usage: Defines the threshold in BAM file size (in bytes) at which data subsampling is used prior to the RSeQC `gene_body_coverage` step.

parameters.name: name
parameters.label: Custom run name
parameters.usage: Helper variable. Do not set, use -name instead.

parameters.name: hisatBuildMemory
parameters.label: HISAT2 indexing: required memory for splice sites in GB
parameters.usage: HISAT2 needs a very large amount of memory to build an index with splice sites. If the available memory is below this threshold, the index build will proceed without splicing information.

parameters.name: multiqc_config
parameters.label: MultiQC Config
parameters.usage: Path to a config file for MultiQC

parameters.name: unmapped
parameters.label: Unmapped
parameters.usage: Save unmapped reads to fastq files

parameters.name: non_directional
parameters.label: Non-directional
parameters.usage: Run alignment against all four possible strands

parameters.name: ignoreFlags
parameters.label: Ignore SAM flags
parameters.usage: Run MethylDackel with the flag to ignore SAM flags

parameters.name: comprehensive
parameters.label: Comprehensive output
parameters.usage: Output information for all cytosine contexts

parameters.name: meth_cutoff
parameters.label: Methylation cutoff
parameters.usage: Specify a minimum read coverage to report a methylation call during Bismark's bismark_methylation_extractor step.

parameters.name: mindepth
parameters.label: Methylation cutoff
parameters.usage: Specify a minimum read coverage for MethylDackel to report a methylation call.

parameters.name: methylKit
parameters.label: methylKit output
parameters.usage: Run MethylDackel with the --methylKit flag to produce files suitable for use with the methylKit R package.

parameters.name: slamseq
parameters.label: SLAM-seq mode
parameters.usage: Run bismark in SLAM-seq mode

parameters.name: local_alignment
parameters.label: Soft-clipping of reads
parameters.usage: Run bismark with --local flag Allow soft-clipping of reads (potentially useful for single-cell experiments)

parameters.name: relaxMismatches
parameters.label: Relax mismatches
parameters.usage: Turn on to relax stringency for alignment (set allowed penalty with --numMismatches)

parameters.name: numMismatches
parameters.label: Mismatch penalty
parameters.usage: 0.6 will allow a penalty of bp * -0.6 - for 100bp reads (bismark default is 0.2)

parameters.name: readPaths
parameters.label: Read Paths
parameters.usage: For use with nextflow config files only
